Uses of Class
org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGColor

Packages that use SVGColor
Package
Description
org.tquadrat.foundation.svg
Classes for the handling of SVG.

The builder components had been created primarily based on the information from the Mozilla Developer Network about SVG, but the standards are defined by the W3C: Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) 1.1 (Second Edition).
org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.internal
The internal implementations for the SVG elements.
org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type
The data types for the SVG attributes.

  • Uses of SVGColor in org.tquadrat.foundation.svg

    Methods in org.tquadrat.foundation.svg that return SVGColor
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static final SVGColor
    SVGUtils.color()
    Returns the SVGColor instance with the type "inherit".
    static final SVGColor
    SVGUtils.color(boolean flag, int red, int green, int blue)
    Creates a new SVGColor instance from the given colour values.

    Allowed are the values from 0 to 255, or 0% to 100% respectively, other values will be normalised accordingly.
    static final SVGColor
    SVGUtils.color(int red, int green, int blue)
    Creates a new SVGColor instance from the given colour values.

    Allowed are the values from 0 to 255, other values will be normalised accordingly.
    static final SVGColor
    SVGUtils.color(String color)
    Creates a new SVGColor instance, using the given argument as a CSS colour name.

    The given argument may not be null nor the empty String, but it will not undergo any further validation.
